TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormViewUpdatedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将引发事件更新按钮时 (与按钮及其`CommandName`属性设置为"更新") 在控件内单击时，之后控件更新的记录。The control raises the event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the control updates the record. 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如每次此事件发生时检查更新操作的结果的事件处理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs. 一个对象传递给事件处理方法，可用于确定受影响的记录和任何可能发生的异常数。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定由更新操作影响的记录数，请使用属性。To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the property. 使用属性以确定是否发生任何异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 您还可以指示是否处理了该异常中的事件处理方法通过设置属性。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the property. 如果需要访问已更新记录的原始键字段值，使用属性。If you need to access the original key field values for the updated record, use the property. 可以使用访问的原始非键字段值属性。The original non-key field values can be accessed by using the property. 使用访问更新后的值 （其中包括已更新的键字段值，如果允许用户编辑键字段）属性。Updated values (which include updated key field values, if you allow the user to edit key fields) are accessed using the property. 默认情况下控制返回到由指定的模式更新操作后的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 当处理更新操作过程中发生的异常，您可以保留控件处于编辑模式，通过设置属性设置为`true`。When handling an exception that occurred during the update operation, you can keep the control in edit mode by setting the property to `true`. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用对象传递给事件处理方法事件以确定是否在更新操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 affectedRows, class System.Exception e) cil managed
Public Sub New (affectedRows As Integer, e As Exception)

param.name: affectedRows
param.span: 受更新操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，表示在执行更新操作时引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception raised when the update operation was performed.

param.span: 如果未引发异常，则将 用于此参数。

span.span: If no exception is raised, use for this parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 类的某个实例的初始属性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the class. |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||对象中包含`e`参数。The object contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| ||初始化为`false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 在引发事件时，主要由控件开发人员使用此构造函数。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AffectedRows As Integer
public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取受更新操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by the update operation.

value.span: 受更新操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定受更新操作影响的记录数。Use the property to determine the number of records affected by the update operation. 此属性通常用于验证在以下情况下更新了正确的记录数：This property is commonly used to verify that the correct number of records was updated in the following situations: - 验证已更新单个记录。Verify that only a single record was updated. 有时未正确编写的 update 语句可以更新多个记录。Sometimes an improperly written update statement can update multiple records. - 验证不会引发异常在更新操作期间发生错误时，已更新记录。Verify that a record was updated when an error occurs during the update operation that does not raise an exception. - 验证时支持冲突检测 （开放式并发检查），如数据源控件已更新记录并控件，具有其属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`枚举值.Verify that a record was updated when a data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the and controls, has its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value. 在此设置，可能不会更新已被另一用户同时修改一条记录。Under this setting, a record that has been modified by another user concurrently might not be updated. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以验证已更新记录。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to verify that a record was updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取更新操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示更新操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An object that represents the exception that was raised during the update operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以确定异常 （如果有） 更新操作过程中引发。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the update operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且你决定要处理的事件处理程序中的异常，请务必设置属性设置为`true`; 否则为异常再次使用控件。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is thrown again by the control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来确定是否在更新操作期间发生了异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during an update operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExceptionHandled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作过程中所引发的异常是否已在事件处理程序中得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the update operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当更新操作期间引发异常时，使用属性以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常。When an exception is raised during the update operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 当此属性设置为`true`，该异常被视为处理且不会再次使用引发控件。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not thrown again by the control. 如果此属性设置为`false`，再次引发异常。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is thrown again. 若要确定引发哪个异常，请使用属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性以指示是否已在事件处理程序处理异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepInEditMode { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.KeepInEditMode : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在更新操作完成后 控件是否仍保持在编辑模式下。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should remain in edit mode after an update operation.

value.span: 如果在更新操作之后仍处于编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to remain in edit mode after an update operation; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下控制返回到由指定的模式更新操作后的属性。By default, the control returns to the mode specified by the property after an update operation. 使用属性指定是否控件应继续处于编辑模式。Use the property to specify whether the control should remain in edit mode. 若要保持控件处于编辑模式，将此属性设置为`true`。To keep the control in edit mode, set this property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 仅在这种情况发生 （如正在引发的异常） 需要比往常一样的行为不同的控件时，应使用此属性。This property should be used only when a situation occurs (such as an exception being raised) that requires the control to behave differently than it normally would. 如果控件需要继续处于编辑模式，默认情况下，设置属性改为。If the control needs to remain in edit mode by default, set the property instead. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来保持控件处于编辑模式时则会发生异常。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to keep a control in edit mode when an exception occurs. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的原始键字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 包含一个字典，该字典由已更新记录的原始键字段的名称/值对组成。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the original key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含原始值的键字段中列出属性的控件。The property contains the original values of the key fields listed in the property of a control. 使用属性来访问已更新记录的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值要保留的已更新的记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. > [!NOTE] > 如果允许用户更新的键字段的值属性包含原始键字段值。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the property contains the original key field values. 更新后的值存储在属性。The updated values are stored in the property. 属性返回对象，它实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含对象表示已更新记录的字段。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要访问的字段名称，请使用属性的对象。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，通过使用访问的字段值属性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如) 可以仅按索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问已更新记录的键字段的值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key field for an updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property NewValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的新字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的新字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the new field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已更新记录的新字段值。Use the property to access the new field values for the updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值要保留的已更新的记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. > [!NOTE] > 如果允许用户更新的键字段的值属性包含原始键字段值。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the property contains the original key field values. 更新后的值存储在属性。The updated values are stored in the property. 属性返回对象，它实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含对象表示已更新记录的字段。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要访问的字段名称，请使用属性的对象。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，通过使用访问的字段值属性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如) 可以仅按索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问为已更新记录的非键字段由用户输入的新值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the new values entered by the user for the non-key fields of the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OldValues As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取一个字典，该字典包含已更新记录的原始非键字段的名称/值对。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains the original non-key field name/value pairs for the updated record.

value.span: 一个 ，包含被更新记录的原始字段名称/值对字典。

span.span: An that contains a dictionary of the original field name/value pairs for the updated record.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来访问已更新记录的原始非键字段值。Use the property to access the original non-key field values for the updated record. 例如，可以使用这些值要保留的已更新的记录的日志。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of updated records. 支持冲突检测 （开放式并发检查），如数据源控件并控件，使用其属性设置为`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`也将对这些原始值进行比较执行更新操作前在数据库中的记录。A data source control that supports conflict detection (optimistic concurrency checking), such as the and controls, with its property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` also compares these original values against the record in the database before an update operation is performed. 如果已由另一个用户同时修改一条记录，记录不会更新。If a record has been modified by another user concurrently, the record is not updated. > [!NOTE] > 属性不包含键字段。The property does not contain key fields. 如果允许用户更新的键字段的值时，原始键字段值存储在属性。If you allow the user to update the values of the key fields, the original key field values are stored in the property. 更新后的值存储在属性。The updated values are stored in the property. 属性返回对象，它实现接口。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含对象表示已更新记录的字段。The object contains objects that represent the fields of the updated record. 若要访问的字段名称，请使用属性的对象。To access the field names, use the property of the object. 同样，通过使用访问的字段值属性。Similarly, you can access the field values by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用的索引器直接对象访问该字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. 数据源的字段顺序所依赖的控件 (如) 可以仅按索引访问字段值。Data source controls that rely on the field order (such as ) can access field values only by index. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来访问已更新记录的非键字段的原始值。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to access the original values of the non-key fields for the updated record. [!code-aspx-csharp[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/CS/formviewupdatedeventargscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[FormViewUpdatedEventArgs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/FormViewUpdatedEventArgs/VB/formviewupdatedeventargsvb.aspx#1)]
